post_message: You, Lord, keep my lamp burning; my God turns my darkness into light. (Psalm 18:28) We must not close our eyes when evil presents itself, for we allow darkness to abound -- it is only with open eyes that we can see His truth and calming presence. Revealed in the midst of chaos, He stands beside us as we stand with each other. With Him, together, we will be made stronger. -Ben
